channel.title: Server hosting
channel.description:
i wasn't sure where to post this because i have not used the website for awhile. anyways i was using a ubuntu 14.04 server to host my hidden service but it didn't pan out so it never got past the nginx and tor. So i came to moparscape hoping i could host a 317 server. I have hosted quite a few servers really none that have panned out. I left because of school stuff but i'm back and hoping to host a rsps server.
I'm really not looking for something that's over project insanity because the higher revisions aren't really my thing.
None the less. I can show and allow root access to my ubuntu 14.04 Server. i done a clean reinstall and installed java among all the other stuff needed for rsps. So the specifications are.
Ubuntu 14.04 LTS Ram: 8GB VCores: 4 Bandwidth: 3TB Connection: 100mbs ddos protect included. VPN SETUP: i have a vpn that could be setup to run under but i never really tried it besides on my lubuntu laptop. not sure how it would work running an rsps server. we can talk about it if you want.
I have been around awhile i'm not known to really anyone that plays anymore. I will do any of the system administrator tasks because most don't know how to use it for some un-godly reason they use windows. Anyways.
Contact me on skype. at.
SchoolEncryption or you can pm me here. it's complety up to you but i'm always on skype.

item.title: Server hosting
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

i wasn’t sure where to post this because i have not used the website for awhile. anyways i was using a ubuntu 14.04 server to host my hidden service but it didn’t pan out so it never got past the nginx and tor. So i came to moparscape hoping i could host a 317 server. I have hosted quite a few servers really none that have panned out. I left because of school stuff but i’m back and hoping to host a rsps server.

I’m really not looking for something that’s over project insanity because the higher revisions aren’t really my thing.

None the less. I can show and allow root access to my ubuntu 14.04 Server. i done a clean reinstall and installed java among all the other stuff needed for rsps. So the specifications are.

Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
Ram: 8GB
VCores: 4
Bandwidth: 3TB
Connection: 100mbs
ddos protect included.
VPN SETUP: i have a vpn that could be setup to run under but i never really tried it besides on my lubuntu laptop. not sure how it would work running an rsps server. we can talk about it if you want.

I have been around awhile i’m not known to really anyone that plays anymore. I will do any of the system administrator tasks because most don’t know how to use it for some un-godly reason they use windows. Anyways.

Contact me on skype. at.

SchoolEncryption or you can pm me here. it’s complety up to you but i’m always on skype.
